title: My Melody: Sweets Time
author: DaveMars616
description:
A TWiLight Menu++ theme port of the JP exclusive 'マイメロディ スイーツタイム' 3DS theme.
Not a 1:1 port as there are some extra assets taken elsewhere.
Credits to Sanrio Company, Ltd. for the assets, The Spriters Resource for help with ripping some assets, my friend for pointing the original 3DS theme out to me, and my sister for my motivation to port the theme for her.
